item.title: Document tracking System
item.description: You can view the entire code on my GitHub Note: This manual is still being written and it is still unfinished. Enhanced Document Tracking System for SDOIN # This project aims to improve the current tracking system used in the Schools Division of Ilocos Norte. The eDTS achieves better organization of documents by visualizing your current physical arrayed documents in a user-friendly, digital approach. This project also aims to optimize the tracking process, enabling bulk releasing and receiving for units with a lot of documents to work on for improved efficiency.
